page.title: 13LIFESTYLE:VICAR & POLICEMAN
page.content: {The Vicar's Work.}We asked the Vicar to describe his work.He said he is very busy.His easiest day is Sunday when he takes services.On other days he visits people in hospital or at home,reads the Bible and prays for his people,and answers letters.Some times he takes services of baptism, marriage or funerals.He takes classes for people preparing for baptism, confirmation and marriage services.He looks after West Looe,Talland,Polperro and Lansallos. {The Community Policeman}told us that when he joined 30 years ago he had to wear his tunic even on hot days.Police were not as well educated.Nowadays, they need to be 5'9" and need "o" levels.There was no vandalism and no drugs,and there was much less traffic when he joined.He used to cycle,but now he has a Panda car.
